subject: Don't waste your time. Cheap pills are here.
body:
Dear customer.
The pharmacy you shop at got too expensive? Why spend more if you have the opportunity to buy medications of the same generic quality for less?
Our Canadian online pharmacy is happy to offer USA citizens to resort to the services of our e-shop located at CanadianPharmacy. We are the only Canadian Web pharmacy regularly monitored by FDA. CanadianPharmacy all the generic drugs that you might need for less
CanadianPharmacy for economical people who care about their health.
Yours faithfully,Dianna Trotter
